name: Sync Facebook leads to Salesforce for randomized location-based sales rep assignment
description:
Streamline your lead management process by automatically syncing new Facebook leads to Salesforce. This template enhances distribution fairness by randomly assigning each lead to a sales representative based on their geographic location. Ideal for teams with multiple reps per region, it ensures an equitable workload distribution and maximizes conversion opportunities by promptly engaging leads with the right local expertise.
Easily integrate Facebook Leads Ads to Salesforce to capture leads, find the team of reps in the lead's location and randomly assign a rep to the lead ensuring even distribution across your team for maximum conversion.
